name: Who Am I? Quiz | Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: I'm a princess who is constantly being kidnapped. However, I have a rarely-seen evil side that comes out when I help Garland, one person who kidnapped me, be more evil. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Princess Sara.

	Princess Sara is daughter to King Steve, ruler of Corneria. She is constantly annoyed by her father's stupidity, which doesn't seem to be genetic. She once wrote an advice column.

questions.text: I am a Dark Elf, one of the Dark Warriors and my father's name is Astos. I'm very skilled with swords, although mine were once stolen and renamed Stabby and Slashy. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Drizz'l.

	Drizz'l once controlled the spiders found in the Marsh Swamp until he fought the Light Warriors. Once they had beaten him the Dark Warriors found him and he joined their ranks.

questions.text: I'm poetic and romantic as well as a bit naive. I once wooed White Mage, and spend my time wandering around the world with my friends Berserker, Cleric and Rogue. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Ranger.

	Ranger's full name is "Generic Half-Elven Dual-Class Ranger". He reportedly has four times the amount of Ranger in his body that a normal human could hold. Thief once tricked Berserker into thinking Ranger had burned Dwarf Lands.

questions.text: I frequently appear in Fighter's dreams. I wear glasses but have no eyes and I try to give Fighter advice, which he usually ignores or just doesn't hear. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Doctor Swordopolis.

	Doctor Swordopolis is a giant sword who wears glasses. Being a sword, he obviously has no eyes. But then again, anything can happen in the world of "8-Bit Theater"!

questions.text: I am King Steve's right-hand man, but I can't talk. I'm not even a human. In fact, I'm not even alive! Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Rodney.

	Rodney is a coffee stain that King Steve of Corneria relies on for advice, much to the exasperation of his living staff.

questions.text: I am the Wizard Who Did It, in case you wanted to know. I can reverse and stop time, and I've used that power to spend more than seven hundred years trying to explain a concept to one character. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Sarda.

	Sarda is an extremely old wizard who lives in a cave. He sent the Light Warriors to retrieve the Four Orbs, and tried to teach Black Mage the concept of sacrificing oneself. He failed.

questions.text: I am so stupid I once denied the laws of physics! I served as a bodyguard to White Mage, but was killed when I attacked a fire demon. Even so, White Mage later attempted to bring me back to life, but I bled to death. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Black Belt.

	White Mage used a statue of Black Belt to bring him back to life. She overlooked the fact that the head was missing, and when stone turned to flesh, Black Belt died from blood loss.

questions.text: I make good use of my poisoned cookies, which cause those who eat them to have horrible nightmares. I was tricked out of owning Elfland by Thief. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Matoya.

	Matoya fed the Light Warriors her poisoned cookies and promised them the antidote ONLY if they recover her Seeing Orb for her.

questions.text: I am very afraid of Forest Imps, which hinder all my evil plans. Well, I'm actually not that evil, although I certainly try to be! I also formed the Dark Warriors. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Garland.

	Garland is the first villain introduced in the series. He has a mysteriously unexplained ability to summon huge animals to assist him, although this hasn't happened often.

questions.text: I have an unrequited crush on White Mage and am prone to violence when I'm angered or annoyed. Sadly, most of the people I kill are somehow revived or escape death. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Black Mage.

	Black Mage seeks to become the strongest wizard in the world, if not the universe. His attack is the Hadoken from "Street FIghter". It is powered by love, and a divorce happens every time the Hadoken is used.
